titleStmt.title: Great Brittaines generall ioyes. Londons glorious triumphes Dedicated to the immortall memorie of the ioyfull mariage of the two famous and illustrious princes, Fredericke and Elizabeth. Celebrated the 14. of Februarie, being S. Valentines day. With the instalment of the sayd potent Prince Fredericke at Windsore, the 7. of Februarie aforesaid.
titleStmt.author: Nixon, Anthony.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By W. White] for Henry Robertes. and are to be sold by T[homas] P[avier],

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: A.N., i.e. Anthony Nixon.
Printer's and bookseller's names from STC.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
